page.title: 18The Gate Hangs Well
page.content: The Gate Hangs Well is a{Public House} which has been an establishment for selling alcholic beverages for over 100 years. Originally it was a cider house but now sells a full range of drinks and also serves food. It has recently been altered and improved since the present landlord and landlady to over the tenancy. The pub caters for the local{community}during the week, sometimes holding special functions for the{Young Farmers Club. During the week end however many of the customers come from the nearby towns of Redditch, Bromsgrove and Droitwich. It is the few facilities for{recreation}in the area.
